entry.title: Blinded 2-party Musig2
entry.summary: The sender of the email, LL, thanks Tom for explaining something. However, LL still has a question about whether parallel signing requests are needed under the same key. LL mentions that the protocol seems to be sequential, where a utxo is passed from one point to another in sequence. If this is the case, then the Schnorr blind sigs problem doesn't apply.
